```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(DataExplorer)

```


```{r}
df <- read.csv('../data/processed/SVI_all_years.csv')
```

```{r}

head(df)
```


```{r}
df <- df %>% mutate(across(where(is.character), toupper)) %>% mutate(across(where(is.character), str_trim))
```

```{r}
df$FIPS <- as.character(df$FIPS)
```


```{r}
df_sample <- sample_frac(df,size = 0.1)
```

```{r}
df_sample %>% pivot_wider(id_cols = c(FIPS), names_from = YEAR,values_from = c(EP_POV,EP_AGE65))
```
```{r}
df[df$FIPS == 1001020100,]
```

```{r}
as.integer(df$FIPS)
temp <- df %>% group_by(FIPS,YEAR) %>% summarise(n=n()) %>% arrange(desc(n))
```
